alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 2:42AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM EDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following county, Hamilton. * WHEN...Until 545 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 241 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the warned area with Route 28N closed between Long Lake and Blue Mountain Lake due to flooding and debris. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Indian Lake, Speculator, Lake Durant Campground, Blue Mountain Lake, Forked Lake Public Campground, Lake Eaton Campground, Golden Beach Campground, Raquette Lake, Long Lake, Eagle Nest, Deerland, Sabael, Woods, Kamp Kill Kare, Sagamore Lake, Sagamore, Hasbroucks and Catlin Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
